Instruction: Toss cherry tomatoes with olive oil, minced garlic, chopped basil, salt, and black pepper in a baking dish.
Season halibut fillets with salt and pepper.
Place halibut fillets on top of the tomato mixture.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until halibut is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Drizzle with red wine vinegar before serving.
